entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
